name: Shifting and Drifting
description:
Explore an unknown planet full of danger. Take control of two human like Cyborgs in their mission to discover teleportation beacons. 

Includes random level changers and random items, no two playthroughs will be the same.  Enjoy, have fun!

The main GameJam rules I followed were use RTP only,  and you should be able to finish it in less than 30 minutes if you run past roaming enemies.
